title: User Registration
description: As a new consumer, I want to register an account on the Farm-to-Table Marketplace so that I can access personalized features, place orders, and track my purchases.
business_value: Enables user acquisition and personalized experience, forming the foundation for all consumer interactions with the platform.

acceptance_criteria.description: User can access the registration page from the homepage
acceptance_criteria.then: User is redirected to the registration form

acceptance_criteria.description: User can register with email and password
acceptance_criteria.given: User is on the registration page
acceptance_criteria.when: User enters valid full name, email, password, and phone number
acceptance_criteria.then: Account is created and verification email is sent

acceptance_criteria.given: User is on the registration page
acceptance_criteria.when: User enters an invalid email format
acceptance_criteria.then: Error message 'Please enter a valid email address' is displayed

acceptance_criteria.given: User is on the registration page
acceptance_criteria.when: User enters a password less than 8 characters or without required complexity
acceptance_criteria.then: Error message indicating password requirements is displayed

acceptance_criteria.given: User is on the registration page
acceptance_criteria.when: User enters an email that already exists in the system
acceptance_criteria.then: Error message 'An account with this email already exists' is displayed

acceptance_criteria.given: User has submitted the registration form
acceptance_criteria.when: User clicks verification link in email
acceptance_criteria.then: Account is verified and user can log in

technical_notes: Use secure password hashing (bcrypt or similar)
Implement rate limiting on registration endpoint
Store user data with proper encryption
Email verification link should expire after 24 hours

test_cases.title: Successful user registration with valid data
test_cases.expected_result: User account is created, verification email is sent, success message is displayed

test_cases.title: Registration fails with invalid email format
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'Please enter a valid email address' is displayed, form is not submitted

test_cases.title: Registration fails with weak password
test_cases.expected_result: Error message about password requirements is displayed

test_cases.title: Registration fails with duplicate email
test_cases.expected_result: Error message 'An account with this email already exists' is displayed

test_cases.title: Email verification link works correctly
preconditions: User has registered but not verified email
test_cases.expected_result: Account is verified, user can log in successfully

test_cases.title: Password is stored securely
test_cases.expected_result: Password is hashed, not stored in plain text
